			Create Your Own Clean Energy!

		

				

				
				
							Solar panels produce renewable clean energy while securing low utility rates. Our panels exceed industry standards for durability and lifespan.						

				

				
				
					
			
						
									Free Custom Quote
					
					
		

				

				

					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
						
					
			
						
				
																										

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
			Going solar is easy with Sunplicity

		

				

				
				
							Our experts do the legwork. From determining whether your home is a good candidate for solar to matching you with a local solar installer, we are known for our customer service.
In fact, we have the highest customer service score in the industry.*  And our installers are carefully selected and highly trained to help ensure your installation goes smoothly.
						

				

					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
				
			Flexible financing, with $0 down options 

		

				

				
				
							Financing home solar doesn’t have to be complicated. Sunplicity offers three flexible payment options, so you can choose what’s right for you—cash, lease or loan.

With $0 down solar financing, you can start saving with little to no upfront costs. And take advantage of federal tax credits with a cash purchase or our popular loans.						

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
																										

				

					

		

					

		
					

		

					

		
				
						
					
			
						
				
			What Our Customers Have To Say
		

				

					

		

					

		
				
							

							
					
			
						
				
					

				

				

				
				
			Solar Benefits
		

				

				
				
					
			
						
		

				

				

				
						
					
			
						
				
					

						
				
								
			

			
						

									
						
							Lower Electric Bill						
					

				
									
						Lock in your low solar energy rate. Start saving now by going with solar for your home. This means that over the life of your solar energy plan, you could save a lot.					

				
			

			
		

				

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
					

						
				
								
			

			
						

									
						
							Avoid Increasing Rates						
					

				
									
						Rates will continue to increase on your current electricity bill even if your usage doesn’t. Stop them now and go with solar energy. Take control.					

				
			

			
		

				

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
					

						
				
								
			

			
						

									
						
							Tax Credits						
					

				
									
						Receive 30% back in tax credits. This program will not last forever so act fast before the credits disappear!					

				
			

			
		

				

				

					

		

					

		
					

		

					

		
				
							

							
					
			
						
				
					
			
		

				

				

					

		

				
			
						
				
					
			
						
		

				

				

				
				
			How Solar Works?
		

				

				
				
							Solar energy is, simply, energy provided by the sun. This energy is in the form of solar radiation, which makes the production of solar electricity possible.
